about.hero_title: Your peace of mind is our commitment. We coordinate your health and your journey, from start to finish.
about.hero_description: We are specialists in medical tourism that combines plastic surgery, advanced diagnostics, regenerative medicine, dental treatments, and entertainment with over 15 years of experience.

why_choose.section_subtitle: What makes us different from other clinics in Medellín
why_choose.jci_desc: We operate in certified hospitals with the highest international safety standards. Your well-being is our priority.
why_choose.recovery_desc: Recovery in private houses with 24/7 nursing, not impersonal hotels. Comfort and constant medical attention.
why_choose.experience_desc: Team of surgeons with over 15 years perfecting each procedure. Natural results guaranteed.
why_choose.translator_desc: Professional medical translation and personalized assistance at all times. You'll never feel lost.
why_choose.pricing_desc: No hidden costs. All-inclusive: surgery + hospital + recovery + follow-up. No surprises.
why_choose.family_desc: Personalized attention with dignity, respect, and total commitment. Your transformation is our mission.
why_choose.cta_subtitle: Schedule a free virtual consultation with our specialists and discover how we can help you.

team.section_subtitle: Highly qualified professionals with years of experience dedicated to your transformation
team.preview_description: Meet the specialists who will make your transformation a reality.

alejandro.bio: Specialist in fat transfer procedures and reconstructive surgery. Certified by the International Society of Aesthetic Plastic Surgery with over 2,000 successful procedures.

carolina.bio: Pioneer in stem cell therapies and anti-aging treatments. Trained at the best clinics in Europe and the United States with exceptional results.

juan.bio: Expert in digital smile design and complete oral rehabilitation. Certified in advanced implantology and dental aesthetics with cutting-edge technology.

maria.bio: Specialist in laser treatments, facial rejuvenation, and aesthetic medicine. Active member of the American Academy of Dermatology with a focus on natural results.

reviews.section_subtitle: Real reviews from satisfied patients who transformed their lives with Medicol

review1.name: María González
review1.comment: Excellent care from the first moment. The medical team is very professional and the results exceeded my expectations. 100% recommended.

review2.name: John Smith
review2.comment: Amazing experience from consultation to recovery. The doctors are world-class and the facilities are top-notch. Worth every penny.

review3.name: Carlos Ramírez
review3.comment: I came from Spain and was impressed with the quality of service. Everything was perfect, from transportation to post-operative follow-up.

review4.name: Jennifer Lee
review4.comment: Best decision of my life! The team made me feel safe and comfortable throughout the entire process. Results are natural and beautiful.
